duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide personalized assistance to enhance clients' shopping experience and achieve sales goals.
Participate actively on social media platforms to grow personal brand and business.
Maintain consistent high level of service, client relationships, and brand representation.
Utilize online clienteling resource tool to record and maintain client information and preferences.
Focus on providing an exceptional client experience from approach to closing the sale and follow-up.
Maintain counter standards ensuring a clean, tidy, and welcoming space.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 1 year retail experience in the Beauty industry.
